successes.title: Cobblebot 3D Printer
successes.description: Redefining expectations with the first low cost large build area (15x15x15) consumer 3D printer. Change is here; accept nothing less.

Pledges.description: A Forever Thank You: You will be forever listed on a special section of our website as one of the amazing individuals that helped Cobblebot become the multinational and leading 3D Printer company that it is destined to become!  You will also have our eternal gratitude.

Super Early Bird Adopter: This level is for those who want a Cobblebot quickly and want to do the least amount of work to start printing when it arrives! Get one of the first 100 Cobblebot 3D printers to leave the production line. Cobblebot will come FULLY ASSEMBLED and CALIBRATED by the Cobblebot team.  Color of your choice (see details on main campaign page). Shipping not included.

Early Bird Adopter: Get one of the remaining 500 Cobblebot 3D printers to leave the production line in 2014, just in time for Christmas! Color of your choice (see details on main campaign page). Shipping not included.
Get a Cobblebot 3D printer from our first production batch of 2015! Color of your choice (see details on main campaign page). Shipping not included.
Get a Cobblebot 3D printer from our second production batch of 2015! Color of your choice (see details on main campaign page). Shipping not included.

Get a Cobblebot 3D printer from our first production batch of 2015.  Cobblebot will come FULLY ASSEMBLED and CALIBRATED by the Cobblebot team. Color of your choice (see details on main campaign page). Shipping not included.

Why Get One When You Can Get Two For Twice The Price: Get two Cobblebot 3D printers from our first production batch of 2015! Color of your choice (see details on main campaign page). Shipping not included.

Upgrade the Beast: This level is for those who want to upgrade the already massive build area to an even larger size!  Get a Cobblebot 3D printer on steroids that has a build area of 20 x 20 x 20.  Color of your choice (see details on main campaign page). Shipping not included.

Upgrade the Beast: This level is for those who want to upgrade the already massive build area to an even larger size and want to do the least amount of work to start printing when it arrives! Get a Cobblebot 3D printer on steroids that has a build area of 20 x 20 x 20. Cobblebot will come FULLY ASSEMBLED and CALIBRATED by the Cobblebot team. Color of your choice (see details on main campaign page). Includes: Heatbed & Case. Shipping not included.
I'll Take FIVE:  Get five Cobblebot 3D printers from our first production batch of 2015! Color of your choice (see details on main campaign page). Shipping not included.
